scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, barefoot and robed in dark blue with gold trim, gesturing with his right hand towards a kneeling woman in a blue mantle and gold patterned dress. He is surrounded by a group of figures, including a man in a red robe and a man in a yellow robe, all with golden halos. Behind them, a stylized green tree stands against a bright blue sky. To the right, a building with a grey facade and an open doorway is visible, with two women in white veils and halos standing near it. The ground is depicted as green grass and sandy earth.
